texto: 4 An organization (for example, national, industrial association, company) imposing this document, as a condition of trade, can specify and make public the minimum set of required processes, outcomes, activities, and tasks, which constitute suppliers’ compliance with the conditions of trade. NOTE 5 Requirements of this document are marked by the use of the verb “shall”. Recommendations are marked by the use of the verb “should". Permissions are marked by the use of the verb “may”. However, despite the verb that is used, the requirements for conformance are selected as described previously.
